What we do

Combining part art & part science is our strength.

  • Email Fundraising
  • Mobile Campaigns
  • Web Design & Development
  • Donation Processing
  • Social Media Management
  • Online Advertising
  • Event Fundraising
  • E-Append Services

We’ll handle the translation from offline to the web and then employ the technology to make it all happen in an integrated manner regardless of what platform you’re using. We take the technology tasks and burden off of nonprofit organizations and the agencies that serve them. Consider us your online fundraising solutions team.
